node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `dbcolumn` ( `tablename` varchar(31) NOT NULL default '', `seq` int(2) NOT NULL default '0', `name` varchar(31) NOT NULL default '', `type` varchar(15) NOT NULL default '', `len` int(3) default NULL, `scale` int(2) default NULL, `nullable` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `defvalue` varchar(255) default NULL, `keyuse` varchar(15) NOT NULL default '', `extra` varchar(255) default '', PRIMARY KEY (`tablename`,`seq`), UNIQUE KEY `tablename` (`tablename`,`name`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: dbcolumn
